```{r neuromelaninMatchI,echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE,fig.width=10,fig.height=7}
#' Train Linear Models for Each Row and Apply to Fixed Variables
#'
#' This function fits a linear regression model for each row in `tempNM`, 
#' mapping the predictors in `intvars` to the target means (`tarints`). 
#' It then applies the learned models to predict the values of `fixvars`.
#' 
#' @param tempNM A dataframe containing the data.
#' @param intvars A character vector of column names to be used as predictors.
#' @param fixvars A character vector of column names to apply the learned model to.
#' @param tarints A numeric vector of target means to map `intvars` to.
#' 
#' @return A dataframe with the original `tempNM` and predictions for `fixvars` as new columns.
#' 
#' @examples
#' fixvars <- getNamesFromDataframe("NM2DMT_NM_avg_substantianigra", tempNM)
#' intvars <- c(getNamesFromDataframe("NM2DMT_NM_q0", tempNM), "NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion", 
#'              "NM2DMT_NM_avg_mean", "NM2DMT_NM_avg_cropped_mean")
#' tempNMtrain <- tempNM[tempNM$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion < 800, ]
#' tarints <- colMeans(tempNMtrain[, intvars])
#' result <- train_and_apply_models(tempNM, intvars, fixvars, tarints)
#' 
#' @export
train_and_apply_models <- function(tempNM, intvars, fixvars, tarints) {
  # Create a copy of the dataframe to store predictions
  result_df <- tempNM
  
  # Loop over each row in the dataframe
  for (i in 1:nrow(tempNM)) {
    # Extract the current row's predictor values
    current_row <- as.numeric(tempNM[i, intvars])
    
    # Check if there is more than one predictor
    if (length(intvars) > 1) {
      # Fit a linear model to map intvars to tarints
      model <- lm(tarints ~ current_row)
      
      # Apply the learned model to the fixvars columns
      fix_values <- as.numeric(tempNM[i, fixvars])
      predictions <- coef(model)[1] + coef(model)[2] * fix_values
    } else {
      # If there's only one predictor, simply scale by the ratio of target to input
      predictions <- tarints * tempNM[i, fixvars] / current_row
    }
    
    # Store the predictions in the result dataframe
    result_df[i, paste0(fixvars, "_pred")] <- predictions
  }
  
  return(result_df)
}

fixvars =  getNamesFromDataframe( "NM2DMT_NM_avg_", ppmitrim, exclusions="_pred" )
intvars = c( getNamesFromDataframe( "NM2DMT_NM_q0", ppmitrim, exclusions="_pred" ), "NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion", "NM2DMT_NM_avg_mean" , "NM2DMT_NM_avg_cropped_mean")
intvars = c( getNamesFromDataframe( "NM2DMT_NM_q0", ppmitrim, exclusions="_pred" ) )
intvars = unique( c(  "NM2DMT_NM_avg_cropped_mean", "NM2DMT_NM_avg_mean", intvars ) )
tempNMtest = ppmitrim[ na2f( ppmitrim$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion < 2222 ), ]
cndx = unique( c( "CN", unique(ppmitrim$joinedDX)[grep("rodromal",unique(ppmitrim$joinedDX))]))
cndx='CN'
tempNMtrain2 = ppmitrim[ 
  na2f(
    ppmitrim$joinedDX %in% cndx &  
    ppmitrim$yearsbl == 0.0 &
    ppmitrim$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate >= 0.2 & 
    ppmitrim$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate <= 0.8 &
    ppmitrim$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion <=800 ), ]
tarints = colMeans( tempNMtrain2[,intvars], na.rm=T )
zz=rowwise_linear_variable_adjustments( tempNMtest, intvars, 
    unique(c(fixvars,nmnames)), tarints, poly_order=1 )
dxvar = 'DXSubAsyn'
dxs=table( zz[,dxvar] )
dxs=names(dxs[dxs>28])
zzsel=zz[ zz[,dxvar] %in% dxs & zz$yearsbl <= 2.5 &
  zz$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate >= 0.3 & 
  zz$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate <= 0.8 &
  zz$mrimfg == 'Siemens' &
  zz$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion > 5, ]
zzsel[na2f(zzsel$joinedDX=='CN'),dxvar]='CNNegative' # good guess
baseids = zzsel$commonID[ zzsel$yearsbl == 0 ]
follids = zzsel$commonID[ zzsel$yearsbl > 0 ]
longids = c( intersect( baseids, follids ), zzsel$commonID[ zzsel[,dxvar] %in% 
    c('CN','CNNegative','CNPositive') ] )
# zzsel = zzsel[ zzsel$commonID %in% longids, ]
zzsel[,dxvar]=as.character(zzsel[,dxvar])
zzsel[na2f(zzsel$joinedDX=='CN'),dxvar]='CN'
zzsel[,dxvar] <- fct_relevel(zzsel[,dxvar], "CN")
table( zzsel[,dxvar] )
zzsel$temp = zzsel$NM2DMT_NM_avg_substantianigra_pred - zzsel$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion_pred
mdl=(lmer( temp  ~ brainVolume_BL + commonSex+ (1|commonID) + (1|SITE)+ age_BL + yearsbl * DXSubAsyn, data=zzsel))
mdl=(lmer( NM2DMT_NM_avg_substantianigra_pred  ~ NM2DMT_NM_evr+
    NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate+ NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion_pred+ 
    commonSex+ (1|commonID)+ age_BL + yearsbl * DXSubAsyn, data=zzsel))
myco=coefficients(summary(mdl))
myco[-1,-c(1:3)]
# visreg::visreg( mdl, 'yearsbl' , dxvar )
print( prplot( mdl, 'yearsbl' , dxvar, colorvar=dxvar, addpoints=2 ) )
#############################################

library( fpc )

```{r neuromelanin3,echo=FALSE,eval=FALSE,fig.width=8,fig.height=12,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,fig.cap='Partial regression plots for example regions that show omnibus level fwe significant differences from controls.'}
###################
###################
# stocheck2=c("24.S","25.S","26.S","36.S","41.S","70.S","72.P")
mydogNM=ppmitrim[ !is.na( ppmitrim[,nmnames[1]]), ]
mydogNM$SITE2=paste0(mydogNM$SITE,".",substr(mydogNM$mrimfg,0,1))
mydogNM$SITE2=factor(mydogNM$SITE2)
# mydogNM = mydogNM[ mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_avg_refregion < 750, ]
qcdata=antsrimpute(mydogNM[,covars])
clustsites=pamk( qcdata, 2:10 )
qcdata$k = clustsites$pamobject$clustering
bigclust = table( qcdata$k )
bigclust = names( bigclust[ bigclust > quantile(bigclust,0.25)])
zz=outlierness( antsrimpute(qcdata), outlierfunctions = c("LOOP","LOF") )
mydogNM$clust=factor( qcdata$k )
mydogNM$loopy=zz$OL_LOOP
# dxel=mydogNM$joinedDX %in% c("PDSporadic","ProdromalSporadic")
dxdfNMlm=data.frame()
for ( voi in (nmstotest2) ) {
  gc()
  n=nrow(dxdfNMlm)+1
  vois = paste0( voi, c("_BL", "_delta" ) )
  othdxform=dxform
  baseids = mydogNM$commonID[ mydogNM$yearsbl == 0 ]
  follids = mydogNM$commonID[ mydogNM$yearsbl > 0 ]
  longids = intersect( baseids, follids )
  selector=mydogNM$yearsbl <= maxy  &  mydogNM$joinedDX %in% dxs  & # mydogNM$clust %in% bigclust
    # mydogNM$SITE2 %in% stocheck  & 
    mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_avg_mean<1500 & mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_avg_mean > 50 &
    mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate <= 0.8 &
    mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate >= 0.3 
  # mydogNM$clust %in% c(2,3,4) & mydogNM$loopy <= 0.5
    # & qcdata$k %in% c(1:5) # 
    # & mydogNM$NM2DMT_NM_q0pt90 < 1000
  othdxform=paste0("1+",dxform)
  allcv = paste(covars,collapse='+')
  covarsX = paste("commonSex+loopy+clust+",allcv,"+", othdxform)
#  covarsX = paste("commonSex+loopy+clust+", othdxform)
#  covarsX = paste("commonSex+T1Hier_resnetGrade+brainVolume_BL+",allcv,"+", othdxform)
#  covarsX = paste("commonSex+", othdxform)
  bform = paste( voi, " ~ ", covarsX )
  longselect = selector & mydogNM$subjectID %in% longids
  temp2 = mydogNM[ longselect, ]
  temp2[,voi]=psych::winsor(temp2[,voi],0.01)
  temp2$SITE=factor(temp2$SITE)
  newform = paste( bform, " + yearsbl"  )
  temp2 = scale_variables_in_equation( temp2, newform, variables_to_exclude=c(voi,'yearsbl','NM2DMT_NM_q0pt90'))
  mdl=lmer( newform, data=temp2 )
  mycoffs = coefficients( summary( mdl ) )
  myeta = data.frame( effectsize::eta_squared(mdl) )
  rownames(myeta)=myeta$Parameter
  myetacnf = myeta['NM2DMT_NM_substantianigra_z_coordinate','Eta2_partial']
  myetavoi = myeta['yearsbl','Eta2_partial']
  myetavoi = myetavoi * (-1.0) * sign( mycoffs['yearsbl','t value'] )
  dxdfNMlm[n,'voiraw']=voi
  dxdfNMlm[n,'voi']=voi
  dxdfNMlm[n,'n']=length(unique(temp2$commonID))
  dxdfNMlm[n,'NM_q0pt90']=mean(temp2$NM2DMT_NM_q0pt90,na.rm=T)
  dxdfNMlm[n,'anv']=mycoffs['yearsbl','Pr(>|t|)']
  dxdfNMlm[n,'eta_p']=myetavoi
  dxdfNMlm[n,'eta_p_conf']=myetacnf
  dxdfNMlm[n,'singular']=isSingular(mdl)
  mygg0 = jtools::effect_plot( mdl,  'yearsbl', interval=T, facet.modx=F, plot.points=F )+ggtitle(voi)
  print(mygg0)
  print( mycoffs[,-c(1:3)] )
  print(voi)
  print(dxdfNMlm[n,])
#  Sys.sleep(3)
  }

voinames=shorten_nm_names(dxdfNMlm$voi)
voinames[1]="t1.vol.sn"

dxdfNMlm[,c("voi","eta_p_r","eta_p_conf",'NM_q0pt90')]
